references.paper_title: Graph neural networks: A review of methods and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of graph neural networks (GNNs), which forms the foundational context for the current research on improving GNN training methods.

references.paper_title: A comprehensive survey on graph neural networks
references.reason: This survey offers a detailed analysis of various GNN architectures, which is relevant to the paper's investigation of GNN training algorithms.

references.paper_title: Random synaptic feedback weights support error backpropagation for deep learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of feedback alignment, a biologically plausible alternative to backpropagation, which is central to the proposed DFA-GNN approach.

references.paper_title: Direct feedback alignment provides learning in deep neural networks
references.reason: This work presents the direct feedback alignment (DFA) algorithm, which the current research adapts and extends for application to GNNs.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), a specific type of GNN that serves as a case study for evaluating the proposed DFA-GNN framework.
